events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your credentials in detail.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as you meet the key qualifications related to software development.
A recruiter from the Engineering hiring team has been assigned to guide you through the interview process and answer any questions.
We conducted an initial screening call focusing on your background in devops and software engineering technologies.
Thank you for the insightful screening; I am very interested in advancing further and learning more about the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC. It will focus on coding problems and system design.
You performed exceptionally well during the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went smoothly with discussions around your career goals and how they align with our company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position including competitive salary and benefits.
I have reviewed the offer and am excited about the opportunity to join your engineering team and contribute my skills.
I officially accept the offer and look forward to starting my career at your company as a Software Engineer.
Onboarding has commenced with the introduction to the devops team, tools, and initial training sessions scheduled.
The hiring process is now complete. We welcome our new Software Engineer onboard and look forward to great success together.
